Package index

All functions

bsol_document()
Convert to an BSOL Word document
bsol_presentation()
Convert to an BSOL ICS xaringan presentation
bsol_setup()
Set up your environmental variables for BSOL templates
bsol_slide_template()
Convert to an BSOL ICS Officer Powerpoint presentation
bsol_theme_cols()
BSOL Theme Colours
scale_colour_bsol() scale_color_bsol() scale_fill_bsol()
BSOL ICS Gradient colour Scale
bsol_theme_pal()
BSOL ICS Theme Palettes
ggplotly_bsol()
ggplotly BSOL wrapper for passing the font size properly
theme_bsol()
Creates the BSOL Theme for ggplot
theme_bsol_officer()
Creates the BSOL Theme for ggplot, with Officer package
